title: Center for Wildlife forced to euthanize bald eagle
description: YORK, Maine – The bald eagle was an adolescent, less than a year old. He was found in the back yard of a York home, just sitting, listless, unable to fly. When he was brought to the Center for Wildlife last Monday, his blood tests all came back normal."He was seemingly a very healthy animal," said Sonja Ahlberg, the center's medical clinic coordinator. "Except he was clearly very sick."By Wednesday afternoon, he was “in pretty severe respiratory distress.” He could barely

title: Dynamic Nature of a Compassionate Governor -By Steve Ayorinde
description: Dynamic Nature of a Compassionate Governor -By Steve Ayorinde - Comments comments Related posts: No related posts.
body:
on a few occasion when meticulous people express interest in why the Lagos State Governor , Mr. Akinwunmi Ambode , prefer to keep he middle name in the background , 1.0 tend to wonder if the tradition of add a middle name to 1.0 's identity or use initial PAST_REF 1.0 assume public office be a constitutional requirement or simply to boost 1.0 's social status
but before 1.0 could register Dapo as the governor 's middle name on inquisitive mind , many Lagosians themselves be already unanimous in they agreement that the governor have PRESENT_REF acquire a acceptable middle name -- Compassion -- by virtue of he people-oriented style of governance
they be correct
to address the man at the helm of affair in Lagos State as Mr. Compassionate be indeed state the obvious , because Ambode 's administration in P7M have bring verve to the art of selfless service , by neatly coating he policy and direct intervention with what he term ` compassionate governance .
it be not difficult to see why Lagosians have acknowledge that a man with a kind mien be PRESENT_REF steer the ship of this state at a time that the rest of the country say belt-tightening be the only option for survival in these very austere time
this Ambode 's trait become unmistakable from he 1.0 PXD in office
and it would not matter to this epe-born , cerebral administrator whether he be personally attend to a accident victim whose car skid off the road during rush-hour traffic or give succour to a family in distress
which woman will ever forget the joy on the face and in the life of Mrs. Ruth Uche , who be give a home and financial assistance by the governor after she be abandon by she husband for give birth to a 3.0 set of twin
or who will not rejoice with Mr. Godwin Odia , who in P1D lose 4.0 child in a landslide disaster in the Magodo area of Lagos in XXXX-11 but who have PRESENT_REF be rehabilitate with n5m donation from the state governor
nor , would the story of Pa.
Alfred Ilenre escape Lagosians
the P76Y activist and chairman of the XXXX-06-12 Coalition of democratic formation have sustain a disorder in he left lung as a result of a fatal accident he have in Ghana in 1998 during the National Democratic Coalition -lrb- NADECO -rrb- crisis
Governor Ambode have notice the man 's frail condition at a ceremony in Lagos to commemorate THIS P1Y INTERSECT XXXX-06-12 and have subsequently direct that the man be give the best of medical attention
it be a grateful Pa.
ilenre that return to the Lagos House in Ikeja , OFFSET PXM to testify to Ambode 's care nature and large heart -- Compassion
yet , private individual be not the sole beneficiary of Ambode 's generosity
the governor and people of Borno , Yobe and Adamawa state be not likely to forget he in a hurry , for he kind donation of n50m to each of the state
it be the governor 's way of show compassion to those 3.0 state mostly affect by act of insurgency and terrorism affect the north-eastern part of the country
if Ambode have do well invest in the security of life and property in Lagos , a city-state that be witness a large daily influx of people from state affect by insurgency and harsh economic reality , he donation in XXXX-10 to those state also confirm the governor 's firm understanding of the leadership role that be expect of Lagos as Nigeria 's most prosperous state and Africa 's 6.0 largest economy
all these evoke the import of the governor 's inaugural speech on 2015-05-29 when he state without equivocation that `` compassionate governance '' would be the hallmark of he administration
to the civil servant and other public service worker in Lagos , who consider Ambode they biggest icon , be the 1.0 career civil servant to be elect a governor in this cosmopolitan and multi-cultural state , the compassionate content in the PRESENT_REF administration ring true indeed
prompt payment of salary , through which most other state governor be assess , be the least of Ambode 's worry
in fact , the buzz around the civil service these PXD be that the alert from payment of salary come in such a unbelievable good time that some people have to pretend that the alert be not on they phone so that they do not start spend before THIS P1M end
not only have the governor streamlined the annual disbursement of ` XXXX-12-25 rice ' to worker , he have actually favour a 25.0 per $ tax-free bonus , which have since be pay with the XXXX-12 salary to every worker , over the sharing of rice and other edible item that often leave junior worker short-change
however , in Ambode 's compassionate world , man shall not live by bread alone
as part of he effort to improve the welfare of worker , the dynamic governor have extend the Accident Insurance Policy for its workforce to cover accident record outside work PTXH
in PAST_REF , the policy cover only accident record during work PTXH
it cover every employee and every form of accident during the active service PXY of the concerned staff regardless of the period of occurrence
for sure , there be a sense in give worker the necessary incentive to go the extra mile as employee of the state throughout they PXY in service if the state wish to get the best out of they
this indeed be a welcome addition to the provision of the Lagos State Pension Reform Law 2007 which stipulate that the life insurance policy will be make mandatory for employee through the appropriate insurance company to pay compensation that be P3Y basic emolument of the concerned staff , comprise of basic salary , housing allowance and transport allowance as benefit for the relative in case of a employee 's death while in service
yet , the Ambode administration have start the review of the payment of additional 20.0 per cent of accruable rights to the family of deceased worker , outside the basic entitlement under the State Pension Law
this proposal sure speak volume about a government that be sympathetic to the plight of family of deceased personnel and the need to provide they with succor
read Ambode 's lip , the direction of he administration be also to seek the harmonisation of the career progression of officer in the Lagos State Public Service , which suggest the need for a review of the career progression of officer in the local Government Service , parastatal organisation and other government-owned agency with a view to harmonise they with what obtain in the mainstream civil service
for a governor who spend P27Y in the public service , a good chunk of which be record in the local government sector as treasurer before rise to be auditor-general for local government , nothing short of this type of fairness , equity , global best practice and the fact that no 1.0 should be leave behind be expect of he
the need to bring relief to he worker , both serve and retire , accord to this compassionate governor , therefore , be very paramount ; which be why he have expend more than n11bn on payment of pension arrears alone since he assume office
in addition , retirement seminar be organise for officer about to retire so as to assist they in they retirement while the Post Service Directorate in the Office of Head of Service be efficient in provide information and assistance to worker and retiree on they welfare and other need
Ayorindeis the Lagos State Commissioner for Information and

title: Mexico to extradite ‘El Chapo,’ U.S. official says – ABQJournal Online
description: MEXICO CITY – Mexico is willing to extradite drug lord Joaquin "El Chapo" Guzman to the Unit ...
body:
MEXICO CITY -- Mexico be willing to extradite drug lord Joaquin `` El Chapo '' Guzman to the United States , a federal law enforcement official say XXXX-WXX-6
it be a sharp reversal from the official position after he last capture in 2014
`` Mexico be ready
there be plan to cooperate with the U.S. , '' say the official , who speak on condition of anonymity because he be not authorize to comment
but he caution that there could be a lengthy wait before U.S. prosecutor can get they hand on Guzman , the most-wanted trafficker who be recapture XXXX-WXX-5 after P6M on the run : `` you have to go through the judicial process , and the defense have its element too .
top official in the party of President Enrique Peña Nieto also float the idea of extradition , which they have flatly rule out before Guzman 's embarrassing escape from Mexico 's top maximum security prison on XXXX-07-11
but even if mexican official agree , Guzman 's attorney Juan Pablo Badillo say that the defense have already file 6.0 motion to challenge extradition request
`` they can challenge the judge , challenge the probable cause , challenge the procedure , '' say Juan Masini , former U.S. Department of Justice attache at the U.S. Embassy in Mexico
`` that be why it can take a long time
they will not challenge everything at PAST_REF ... they can drip , drip , milk it that way .
Guzman , a legendary figure in Mexico who go from a farmer 's son to the world 's top drug lord , be apprehend after a shootout between gunman and mexican marine at a home in Los Mochis , a seaside city in Guzman 's home state of Sinaloa
the operation result from P6M of investigation by mexican force , who located Guzman in a rural part of Durango state in XXXX-10 but decide not to shoot because he be with 2.0 woman and a child , say mexican Attorney General Arely Gomez
after that , he take a lower profile and limit he communication until he decide to move to Los Mochis in XXXX-12
follow he capture , the head of the powerful , international Sinaloa Cartel be bring to Mexico City 's airport , frog-march to a helicopter before news media , and fly back to the same prison he have flee
there be immediately call for he quick extradition , just as there be after the 2014-02 capture of Guzman , who face drug-trafficking charge in several U.S. state

title: FDL Native And NY Artist Open Exhibits At Thelma
body:
Thelma Sadoff Center for the art -lrb- thelma -rrb- announce that it will host a free reception for artist Nick Lamia and Tom Berenz XXXX-01-14 , from T19:55 Berenz 's exhibit , 3.0 Feet under , feature painting that represent Berenz 's relationship to the world around he ; cerebral , physical , intellectual and visceral
`` Fond du Lac be my hometown and thelma be a extraordinary place , '' Berenz say
`` I be honor and grateful to have a exhibition at THELMA .
Berenz use the disaster motif as a metaphor to discuss personal , sociopolitical , environmental and ideological issue
through the motif of disaster , he explore the existential self and examine personal narrative , with some be more literal and other more enigmatic
Berenz earn he bachelor 's degree in fine art from the University of Wisconsin-Oshkosh and he master 's in fine art at the uw-madison
he be a Assistant Professor of Art at UW-Parkside
he live and work in Milwaukee
Lamia 's exhibit , thread , be a show of work on paper that will allow audience to see a range of he style and how they interweave and fit together
`` I be thrill at the prospect of a exhibition in Fond du Lac , for , although I have spend a great deal of my life outdoors , I have no experience with the Midwest in deep XXXX-WI , '' Lamia say
`` I be excite to experience , in person , the landscape and weather associate with that time and place , and to see , go forward , how the experience might affect my work .
Lamia be a award-winning artist whose work include drawing , painting , printmaking , installation , and sculpture
he receive a bachelor 's degree in environmental science from U.C. Berkeley , a master 's in fine art in painting from Boston University , and also attend the New York Studio School for painting
he be the recipient of a Guggenheim fellowship as well as residency at Wave Hill , the MacDowell Colony , the Robert Blackburn print Workshop and the Triangle Artists Association where he be PRESENT_REF a member of the board of director
both exhibit will be open through XXXX-02-28
THELMA 's Contemporary wing be free to the public , thanks to the generosity of Horicon Bank and the Wisconsin Arts Board

title: Relocation to Prague Czech Republic - Visas, Flats, Relocation Service, ...
description: Choosing a bank account isn't always as easy - Prague.TV ’ s overview of banks with English language customer service in Prague , Moving to a new country is an exciting process! Prague.TV’s relocation section offers expats all the information you need to make your move to Prague as smooth as possible.
body:
choose a bank be a very important process when move to a new country
sometimes if rush , it be easy to choose a bank that be not necessarily the best to suit 1.0 's need
fortunately , there be a variety of bank to choose from in the Czech Republic that all have different history , service offer and english-language accessibility.english-speaker friendly bank : česká spořitelna : vote Bank of THIS P1Y INTERSECT 2015 , česká spořitelna have more ATM 's in the Czech Republic than any other bank
offer free account to student for P2Y after they graduation
the bank also offer child 's account and a Expat Center that be design for foreign client for easy communication in English , German and French
www.csas.cz -lrb- ENG -rrb- Citibank : A bank with P200Y of history of offer financial service in over >160.0 country and manage client account for around ~2.0E8 customer
the bank open in the Czech Republic in 1991 and have a easy to use English version of they website
www.citibank.cz -lrb- ENG -rrb- čsob -lrb- československá obchodní banka -rrb- : a popular bank in both the Czech Republic and Slovakia be establish in 1964 as a bank that provide service in the field of foreign trade financing and convertible currency operation
čsob provide a variety of service include : financing housing need , insurance product , pension fund , collective investment , asset management , leasing , factory and service relate to trade equity on financial market
www.csob.cz -lrb- ENG -rrb- Equa Bank : found in 2011 , Equa Bank have 150000.0 customer , 57.0 business point and have be avoid 14.0 prize
they advertise themselves as offer simple , comprehensible and transparent banking service for retail and business customer
Equa Bank offer basic private account , business account , loan , mortgage , savings and insurance
www.equabank.cz -lrb- ENG -rrb- Expobank : found on czech market in 1991 , the well-established bank have be recognize as a modern and universal commercial bank that advertise itself as provide top-class service and react promptly to the need of corporate , private and affluent individual client
Expobank have a easy to use internet banking system available in Czech , English and Russian
www.expobank.cz -lrb- ENG / ru -rrb- Fio Bank : this exclusively czech-owned bank become a bank in 2008
offer standard banking service without any fee
before it be a bank , it be a company offer financial service
Fio Bank have win many award , include the Friendliest Bank of THIS P1Y INTERSECT 2011 INTERSECT 2012 and 2013
the website be available in Czech and English
www.fio.cz -lrb- ENG -rrb- GE Money Bank : GE offer financial service for around ~1.0E8 client include individual as well as small and medium-sized enterprise
1.0 of the largest financial institution in the Czech Republic have win medal in the Golden Crown competition
the website be available in Czech and English
www.gemoney.cz -lrb- ENG -rrb- kb -lrb- komerční banka -rrb- : ranking among the leading banking institution in the Czech Republic as well as Central and Eastern Europe , kb be a universal bank that provide a wide range of service in retail , corporate and investment banking
the bank be establish in 1990 and it be a english-speaker friendly bank with a comprehensible website in Czech and English
www.kb.cz -lrb- ENG -rrb- / Service for foreigner -lrb- ENG -rrb- Oberbank AG : establish in 1869 , Oberbank AG advertise themselves as `` that much more than a bank ''
with bank in Austria , Germany , Slovakia , Hungary and the Czech Republic , this independent regional bank focus on customer confidence and be the 1.0 point of contact for financial service within they region
they website be available in English ad well as czech www.oberbank.czraiffeisenbank : the 5.0 largest bank in the country , Raiffeisenbank have more than >120.0 branch and client center throughout the Czech Republic
establish in the Czech Republic in 1993 , the bank provide a wide range of banking service to private and corporate client in the Czech Republic
www.rb.czsberbank cz : serve almost ~100000.0 customer in the Czech Republic , Sberbank CZ be a modern bank boast a comprehensive portfolio of product and service design for individual , small and medium enterprise as well as large corporation
they have a easy to use online banking in Czech and English and they have win a handful of award and accolade include the most client-oriented bank of 2015
www.sberbankcz.cz -lrb- ENG / ru -rrb- UniCredit Bank : UniCredit launch it be activity in the Czech Republic in 2007-11
it be 1.0 of the only bank in the Czech Republic that write and cash in check in foreign currency include US Dollars
UniCredit place 2.0 in the bank of THIS P1Y INTERSECT 2015 and offer account in multiple international currency
the easy to use website be available in Czech and English
www.unicreditbank.czother bank with great service : Air Bank : found in 2011-11 , Air Bank advertise itself with the motto : `` even a bank can be likable ''
the Air Bank staff welcome you personally and offer you free coffee or water
Air Bank be as paperless as possible and have a short , understandable 3.0 page contract
they be not english-speaker friendly yet
in the 2015 bank of THIS P1Y competition in the Czech Republic , Air Bank place 3.0
www.airbank.czERB Bank -lrb- European-Russian Bank -rrb- : the 1.0 bank with a russian capital be officially open in 2009
the priority of ERB Bank be finance czech export to Russia , monetary transaction include transaction in russian ruble , operation include deposit and conversion
the website be available in Czech and Russian
www.erbank.cz -lrb- ru -rrb- mbank : establish in 2007-11 , mbank be the 1.0 bank to offer it be client a new self-service model
this model allow the client to manage all of they daily banking operation by themselves with the help of mbank staff via the internet or telephone
the bank do not have a website in English yet

title: Commission to consider easement for RaceTrac
description: WINTER HAVEN — Plans for a RaceTrac on U.S. 27 at Lucerne Park Road are getting back on track.
body:
XXXX-WI haven -- plan for a racetrac on U.S. 27.0 at Lucerne Park Road be get back on track
commissioner will vote XXXX-WXX-1 on whether or not the city will vacate part of a utility easement the propose RaceTrac would need to use in exchange for a new easement nearby
the exchange would be at no cost to the city , accord to Merle Bishop , the city 's growth management director
he say he be not sure how long the RaceTrac have be in the work , `` but I think it would be further along by PRESENT_REF .
there have be right-of-way issue , he say , that have stall the development
he suspect it to open in THIS P1Y , though
the city 's engineering department be work on final site plan for the gas station at 32886.0 U.S. 27.0 that include a 5500.0 square foot convenience store and 55.0 parking space
the new location will be THIS PT1S INTERSECT WI and the 10.0 in Polk County
racetrac be popular for they swirl world frozen yogurt station , coffee bar and beer cave
if the easement exchange be approve , RaceTrac will request clearance from the Florida Department of Environmental Protection
upon fdep 's approval , a new sanitary sewer pipe will be place into operation
City staff say franchised utility provider be contact and do not have facility in the easement that may be vacate by the city
in other business , newly elect commissioner will be swear in and commissioner will select who will be mayor and mayor pro tem for THIS P1Y
William Twyford will be swear into seat 1.0
he receive %50.4 of the vote in the XXXX-12-01 runoff election against Commissioner J.P. Powell
Mayor Nat Birdsong will be swear into seat 2.0
he receive %58.0 of the vote in the XXXX-11-03 election against opponent Debbie Ogzewalla and Bob Jardine
and Commissioner Pete Chichetto will be swear into seat 3.0 for PT1S term
he receive %53.9 of the vote in the XXXX-12-01 runoff election against challenger Kemp Brinson
commissioner be pay $8737.0 per P1Y and serve P4Y term
however , the mayor , who become the city 's chief ambassador and ribbon-cutter , be pay a extra $5995.0 in yearly expense , while commissioner be pay $3140.0 for yearly expense
the City Commission meet on the second and XXXX-WXX-1 of each month at T18:30 at City Hall , 451.0 3.0 St. N.W. - Madison Fantozzi can be reach at madison.fantozzi@newschief.com or 863-401-6971
follow she on Twitter @madisonfantozzi

title: Road ministry to deploy aircraft to monitor highway projects
description: Road ministry to deploy aircraft to monitor highway projects
body:
New Delhi : to monitor implementation of highway project specially in tough terrain , the Road Transport and highway Ministry be set to acquire or hire a 8.0 to 10.0 seater aircraft
the development come at a time when the Ministry of Road Transport and highway plan to enhance the road building capacity to 100.0 km P1D in the long run and 30.0 km P1D by XXXX-03 besides have massive project
National highway Authority of India have invite proposal for consultancy service for preparation of feasibility report for acquisition , hire or take on rent a fixed wing 8.0 to 10.0 seater aircraft with twin engine , a official state
he say the government plan to station the aircraft at Delhi add that the proposal for preparation of feasibility report have be invite by XXXX-01-15
the step be aim at effective monitoring of project in far-flung difficult terrain , the official inform
earlier , the Ministry have discuss the issue with Ministry of Finance and Ministry of Civil Aviation , he say
the government have PAST_REF announce to build a network of 1,000-km highway on a new alignment to link the ` chardham ' at a cost of r 11000.0 crore
also , on the anvil be a 1000.0 km highway project to connect the Buddha Circuit in Uttar Pradesh and Bihar
Road Transport and highway Minister Nitin Gadkari THIS P1W OFFSET P-1W say the government be set to award project worth r 1.5 lakh crore by XXXX-03
source :
organizations: Ministry of Finance and Ministry of Civil Aviation
